Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Burya
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A dedicated multiple launch rocket system platform, the Burya is a long-range siege and area denial weapon that can be operated by a two-man crew for faster loading speeds. Capable of firing continuous volleys of long range missiles, Burya can blanket whole areas in anti-infantry rocket explosions.

Slow-moving and vulnerable to enemy fire, Burya needs to deploy before it can open fire, which may leave it stranded in enemy territory.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
